<url>http://www.lsoft.com/images/listserv_small.gif</url> </image>   <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BSA-RACE-ETHNICITY;8c424820.1503">   <title>CFA: Joining Forces of Philosophy and the Empirical Sciences to Tackle Social Injustices </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BSA-RACE-ETHNICITY;8c424820.1503</link>   <description> Call for Abstracts<br><br>Joining Forces of Philosophy and the Empirical Sciences to Tackle Social<br>Injustices -<br>6th Conference of Experimental Philosophy Group UK<br><br>29-30 June 2015, University of Nottingham<br><br>Confirmed keynote speakers: Kimberley Brownlee (University of Warwick),<br>Edouard Machery (University of Pittsburgh), Ron Mallon (Washington<br>University in St. Louis)<br><br>Deadline for Submissions: 31 March 2015<br><br>Experimental Philosophy Group UK invites the submission of abstracts for<br>posters and papers to be presented at their upcoming conference. We<br>welcome contributions from researchers (from all disciplines) who are<br>engaged in or interested in the investigation of philosophical topics<br>using empirical methods. [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2015-03-12T17:07:31+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Andreas Bunge</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BSA-RACE-ETHNICITY;8c424820.1503</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BSA-RACE-ETHNICITY;5a240f3d.1503">   <title>FW: Announcement of the Chair for the Inquiry into police spying </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BSA-RACE-ETHNICITY;5a240f3d.1503</link>   <description> please see below, might be of interest<br>all the best<br><br>Jas<br><br>Subject: Announcement of the Chair for the Inquiry into police spying<br>From: office@tmg-uk.org<br>To: jasnijjar@hotmail.co.uk<br>Date: Thu, 12 Mar 2015 10:53:25 +0000<br><br>Announcement of the Chair for the Inquiry into police spying News from the Monitoring Group Email not displaying correctly?<br>View it in your browser. For the attention of Editors: Press Release from The Monitoring Group Date: 12 March 2015. Embargo 10am Subject: Announcement of the Chair for the Inquiry into police spying For Further information contact: Suresh Grover 07816301706 or and Stafford Scott 07830133076 The Monitoring Group [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2015-03-12T12:16:23+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Jas Nijjar</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BSA-RACE-ETHNICITY;5a240f3d.1503</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BSA-RACE-ETHNICITY;d138449.1503">   <title>FW: Ethnic inequality in low pay </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BSA-RACE-ETHNICITY;d138449.1503</link>   <description> Professor Robert Moore<br>School of Sociology and Social Policy<br>Eleanor Rathbone Building<br>The University of Liverpool<br>L69 7ZA<br><br>Telephone and fax: 44 (0) 1352 714456    </description>   <dc:date>2015-03-12T11:52:14+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Moore, Robert</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BSA-RACE-ETHNICITY;d138449.1503</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BSA-RACE-ETHNICITY;de78aa80.1503">   <title>FW: Grassroots Community Meeting 5 Includes Rare Screening Of 'Blacks Britannica' Sunday, 22 March 2015, 2-5pm </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BSA-RACE-ETHNICITY;de78aa80.1503</link>   <description> Kwaku<br><br>BBM/BMC<br><br>editor@BritishBlackMusic.com<br><br>www.BritishBlackMusic.com &lt;http://www.BritishBlackMusic.com/&gt;<br><br>New Year Music Biz Empowerment Half-Day Courses London March 6 &amp; 13<br>http://bit.ly/1yONkjH<br><br>Look How Far We've Come Community Talk &amp; DVD Launch/Is Jesus White? May 14<br>http://bit.ly/1xWMG1d<br><br>Grassroots Community Meeting 5 Includes Rare Screening Of 'Blacks<br>Britannica'<br><br>Sunday, 22 March 2015, 2-5pm<br><br>To book: http://bit.ly/1wJA6UT<br><br>This fifth Grassroots Community Meeting is to discuss what gains Black<br>(African &amp; Asian) people have made within British society viz a viz race and<br>class, 50 years after their struggles and activism along with support from<br>progressive factions led to the enactment of the 1965 Race Relations Act<br> [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2015-03-11T08:45:07-00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>msherwood</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BSA-RACE-ETHNICITY;de78aa80.1503</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BSA-RACE-ETHNICITY;ac1f7958.1503">   <title>Claudia Jones Charter Mark </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BSA-RACE-ETHNICITY;ac1f7958.1503</link>   <description> Swazi,<br><br>I thank you for rethinking the name.<br><br>At the moment, with 'Athena Swan' and 'Race Equality', you run the risk of pandering to those who believe (albeit unconsciously) that all the women are white and all the men are black. (Indeed, the name 'Athena' was a particularly unhelpful choice, in this regard. Cf. the white backlash over 'Black Athena': http://athenatrickster.blogspot.co.uk/2014/10/putting-athena-into-black-athena.html) You need to advance public understanding of the intersectional nature of social oppression. [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2015-03-10T11:14:09+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Coleman, Nathaniel</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BSA-RACE-ETHNICITY;ac1f7958.1503</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BSA-RACE-ETHNICITY;b8936289.1503">   <title>FW: The English Civil War </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BSA-RACE-ETHNICITY;b8936289.1503</link>   <description> Can anyone help?<br><br>_____<br><br>From: Anthony Etherington &lt;anthonyetherington@btinternet.com&gt;<br>Sent: 06 March 2015 12:12<br>To: Marika Sherwood<br>Subject: The English Civil War<br><br>Good afternoon Marika<br><br>I wonder if you can help me please. I'm writing a story that touches on this<br>war and wondered if you are aware of any black people who fought. They could<br>come have from any part of the British Isles or, perhaps, have been<br>mercenaries from abroad. [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2015-03-07T18:34:13-00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>msherwood</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BSA-RACE-ETHNICITY;b8936289.1503</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BSA-RACE-ETHNICITY;2ce3c011.1503">   <title>Re: Discover Society issue 18, March 2015 </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BSA-RACE-ETHNICITY;2ce3c011.1503</link>   <description> Latest issue of Discover Society.<br><br>Please circulate on local lists.    </description>   <dc:date>2015-03-06T15:19:21+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Bhambra, Gurminder</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BSA-RACE-ETHNICITY;2ce3c011.1503</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BSA-RACE-ETHNICITY;aa0ddb21.1503">   <title>Atmospheres Conference, 1-2 July 2015, University of Manchester - REGISTRATION NOW OPEN </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BSA-RACE-ETHNICITY;aa0ddb21.1503</link>   <description> Registration is now open for our forthcoming Atmospheres Conference.<br><br>Atmospheres play a significant role in, and add an important quality to, our intimate, domestic and public lives, yet are often overlooked in social research, not least because of the methodological challenges involved in 'capturing' them.<br>In this major conference celebrating the 10th anniversary of the Morgan Centre, we will be using the theme of 'atmospheres' as our starting point for interdisciplinary dialogue. [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2015-03-06T12:11:06+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Victoria Higham</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BSA-RACE-ETHNICITY;aa0ddb21.1503</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BSA-RACE-ETHNICITY;903af789.1503">   <title>FW: Invitation to our social event on 12 March </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BSA-RACE-ETHNICITY;903af789.1503</link>   <description> From: ILA-Events [mailto:event@iliberty.org.uk]<br>Sent: 05 March 2015 22:50<br><br>For the occasion of International Women\ufffd\ufffd\ufffds Day<br><br>Dear Ms Sherwood<br><br>You are cordially invited to our event in solidarity with the brave women of Iran and Camp Liberty.<br><br>Keynote speaker: Professor Sara Chandler, member of Law Society Council and<br><br>President of Human Rights Commission of Federation of European Bar Associations [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2015-03-06T07:06:22-00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>msherwood</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BSA-RACE-ETHNICITY;903af789.1503</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BSA-RACE-ETHNICITY;76cdd641.1503">   <title>The Ballot or the Bullet? Thursday 12th March, 6.30pm, Birmingham City University </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BSA-RACE-ETHNICITY;76cdd641.1503</link>   <description> The Organisation of Black Unity presents<br>The Ballot or the Bullet? Does Your Vote Count?<br>Thursday 12th March, 6.30pm<br>Baker 208 Birmingham City University, City North, Perry Barr, Birmingham, B42 2SU<br><br>In May 2015, Britain goes to the polls for the General Election. OBU presents the next in the series of Year X events, a panel discussion based one of Malcolm X's famous speeches, asking how do we build political power in the community. We also ask 'if your vote is worth it at the next election?' [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2015-03-05T17:38:59+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Kehinde Andrews</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BSA-RACE-ETHNICITY;76cdd641.1503</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BSA-RACE-ETHNICITY;7263f8ca.1503">   <title>Media Diversified Experts of Colour Directory Launch </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BSA-RACE-ETHNICITY;7263f8ca.1503</link>   <description> Please find details about the *Media Diversified Experts Directory*<br>attached. It includes the following quote from the Head of Sky interviews,<br>Tami Hoffman who has been beta testing the database over the last 2<br>months.<br><br>*Get access the directory at Media Diversified Experts Directory<br>&lt;http://directory.mediadiversified.org/&gt; *<br><br>We will start taking subscribers on Thursday. We are co-hosting the launch<br>party with the London Press Club &lt;http://pressnews.londonpressclub.co.uk/&gt; [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2015-03-05T08:56:12+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Media Diversified</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BSA-RACE-ETHNICITY;7263f8ca.1503</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BSA-RACE-ETHNICITY;dc629dcf.1503">   <title>FW: All out: National Demo Against Racism & Fascism - 21 March 2015 </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BSA-RACE-ETHNICITY;dc629dcf.1503</link>   <description> If you are interested in CLR James or Chris Braithwaite, read Christian<br>Hogsbjerg's work on his own website: http://christianhogsbjerg.com/    </description>   <dc:date>2015-03-05T08:52:10-00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>msherwood</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BSA-RACE-ETHNICITY;dc629dcf.1503</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BSA-RACE-ETHNICITY;594bbc99.1503">   <title>Birmigham Fellowship in Superdiversity - Vacancy at University of Birmingham </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BSA-RACE-ETHNICITY;594bbc99.1503</link>   <description> Dear All,<br><br>Apologies for cross-posting. You may find this job opportunity of interest<br><br>IRiS is inviting applications to the newly launched Birmingham Fellowship programme from individuals interested in undertaking conceptual work around the notion of superdiversity, developing new theory around societal adaptation to superdiversification and new approaches to modelling and visualising population diversity. The posts are permanent (at Lecturer or Senior Lecturer level), research focused and include a generous support package. For more information see: [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2015-03-04T16:33:42+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Nando Sigona (School of Social Policy)</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BSA-RACE-ETHNICITY;594bbc99.1503</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BSA-RACE-ETHNICITY;afc41378.1503">   <title>FW: Journal of Intercultural Studies Inaugural Conference 2015 </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BSA-RACE-ETHNICITY;afc41378.1503</link>   <description>Full message available at: <a href="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BSA-RACE-ETHNICITY;afc41378.1503">FW: Journal of Intercultural Studies Inaugural Conference 2015 </a></description>   <dc:date>2015-03-04T09:05:22+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Karim.Murji</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BSA-RACE-ETHNICITY;afc41378.1503</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BSA-RACE-ETHNICITY;fe266ea2.1503">   <title>Nawal el Saadawi @ Goldsmiths March 11! </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BSA-RACE-ETHNICITY;fe266ea2.1503</link>   <description> ?Dear colleagues<br><br>Just a reminder that Nawal el Saadawi will be visiting Goldsmiths next Wednesday March 11, 6.30-8pm, George Wood Theatre, for a conversation on Women, Dissidence and Hope.<br><br>The event is free but you do need to register here.<br><br>http://www.eventbrite.com/e/women-dissidence-hope-a-converation-with-nawal-el-saadawi-tickets-15808324123<br><br>All best<br><br>Sara    </description>   <dc:date>2015-03-03T21:20:44+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Nirmal Puwar</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BSA-RACE-ETHNICITY;fe266ea2.1503</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BSA-RACE-ETHNICITY;6892a7e9.1503">   <title>NCCCS Symposium - 19th March 2015 - 'Are we going to be allowed to stay here?' </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BSA-RACE-ETHNICITY;6892a7e9.1503</link>   <description> 'Are we going to be allowed to stay here?': Migration, Discrimination and Resistance<br><br>19th March 2015<br>The Drum, 144 Potters Road, Aston, Birmingham B6 4UU<br>7-9PM<br>(Free entry and no need to prebook)<br><br>Immigrants are being blamed for pressures on housing, jobs and infrastructure, in a context of austerity which is hitting the poorest hardest. Vulnerable people are being encouraged to blame their problems on other vulnerable people, while the government introduces ever harsher measures that directly discriminate against immigrants and people from immigrant backgrounds. Politicians state that 'it's not racist to talk about immigration' at the same time as [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2015-03-03T15:37:24+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Narayan, John</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BSA-RACE-ETHNICITY;6892a7e9.1503</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BSA-RACE-ETHNICITY;265d4661.1503">   <title>CFP PG Conference on Myth(s) in the Social Sciences in Humanities - deadline extension </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BSA-RACE-ETHNICITY;265d4661.1503</link>   <description> Dear all (apologies for cross posting),<br><br>Deadline extension<br>We have decided to extend the Call for Papers deadline to Monday 9th March, 5pm. For those who have missed the deadline yesterday, abstracts should be no longer than 250 words and must be sent by e-mail to myth-2015@york.ac.uk.<br><br>We invite papers and panels including, but not limited to the following topics: [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2015-03-03T12:46:31+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Anais Duong-Pedica</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BSA-RACE-ETHNICITY;265d4661.1503</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BSA-RACE-ETHNICITY;9bd7fb6f.1503">   <title>MA and PhD funding opportunity for the University of New Zealand </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BSA-RACE-ETHNICITY;9bd7fb6f.1503</link>   <description> In case anyone is interested:    </description>   <dc:date>2015-03-03T10:04:12+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Carrillo-Lopez, Ana</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BSA-RACE-ETHNICITY;9bd7fb6f.1503</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BSA-RACE-ETHNICITY;32f61a63.1503">   <title>FW: Celebrating 155 years of Indians in South Africa </title> National<br>Archives and Newcastle University on Vagrancy and Poverty in the<br>Post-Emancipation Anglophone Caribbean, 1834-1900.<br><br>The closing date for receipt of applications is 13 April 2015. Interviews<br>will take place in Newcastle on 5 May 2015.<br><br>More information can be found via:<br><br>http://www.ncl.ac.uk/historical/news/item/collaborative-doctoral-award-in-ca<br>ribbean-history<br><br>Best,<br><br>Victoria<br><br>Victoria Lain<br><br>Research, Grants and Academic Liaison Adviser [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2015-03-02T08:06:13-00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>msherwood</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BSA-RACE-ETHNICITY;749e6226.1503</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BSA-RACE-ETHNICITY;7abda402.1503">   <title>The Ballot or the Bullet? Thursday 12th March, 6.30pm, Birmingham City University </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BSA-RACE-ETHNICITY;7abda402.1503</link>   <description> The Organisation of Black Unity presents<br>The Ballot or the Bullet? Does Your Vote Count?<br>Thursday 12th March, 6.30pm<br>Birmingham City University, City North, Perry Barr, Birmingham, B42 2SU<br><br>In May 2015, Britain goes to the polls for the General Election. OBU presents the next in the series of Year X events, a panel discussion based one of Malcolm X's famous speeches, asking how do we build political power in the community. We also ask 'if your vote is worth it at the next election?'
